headline: Cognizant First to Achieve ISO/IEC 42001: 2023 Accredited Certification for Artificial Intelligence Management Systems
summary: TEANECK, N.J., - Cognizant today announced it has received accredited ISO/IEC 42001:2023 certification for its artificial intelligence management system. Cognizant is the first global IT service...
